alert.note: Alert for San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 04 at 1:08PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands and Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands
